units.title: Tenant authorization + registry consistency
changes: M-003: tenant_id already enforced on promote/quarantine (prior session)
M-004: Added tenant_id + admin/owner role gate to config mutation in tenantDispatcher
M-026: ToolRegistry duplicate IDs now log.warn instead of silent skip (consistent with MaterialRegistry)

units.title: Compliance fixes + hook registry resilience
changes: M-024: HookRegistry loadFromPath() upgraded from log.debug to log.warn when hooks path missing
M-027: ComplianceEngine applyTemplate() checks for existing active hooks before creating duplicates
M-028: Audit score now severity-weighted (mandatory=3x, recommended=2x, optional=1x)
M-029: resolveConflicts() adds INTERSECT strategy for access_control (union required_roles + deny_roles)
